attributes.title: Hunting Ghosts in the Most Haunted Ship in America | USS Hornet
attributes.caption: During WWII, this ship saw countless battles and didn’t receive any major damage but during its tenure, at least 200 soldiers died on board. It is now said to be the most haunted ship in America. For this year's Halloween special, we go on site to investigate the USS Hornet.
attributes.description:
During WWII, this ship saw countless battles and didn’t receive any major damage but during its tenure, at least 200 soldiers died on board. It is now said to be the most haunted ship in America. For this year's Halloween special, we go on site to investigate the USS Hornet.

If you see or hear anything that we missed, leave a comment with timecodes and we'll try to cover it in a special episode of Case Files.

Support the show by becoming a FIRST member at https://bit.ly/RedWebPod-FIRST.

Bonus FIRST Exclusive content including deleted scenes and uncut footage are available at https://roosterteeth.com/series/red-web?season=4.
attributes.display_title: Hunting Ghosts in the Most Haunted Ship in America | USS Hornet

attributes.title: Deleted Scene: Captain & Admiral In-Port Area
attributes.caption: The Red Web team explores more of the Captain & Admiral In-Port area aboard the USS Hornet.
attributes.description: The Red Web team explores more of the Captain & Admiral In-Port area aboard the USS Hornet.
attributes.display_title: Deleted Scene: Captain & Admiral In-Port Area

attributes.title: Deleted Scene: Spirit Writing
attributes.caption: Trevor and Alfredo engage in a new type of investigation tactic: spirit writing. Before they finish, Trevor hears noises coming from a nearby hallway.
attributes.description: Trevor and Alfredo engage in a new type of investigation tactic: spirit writing. Before they finish, Trevor hears noises coming from a nearby hallway.

attributes.title: Deleted Scene: Creepy Hallway & Bonus Flashlight Room
attributes.caption: Trevor and Alfredo explore more of the ship and attempt to engage in additional conversation with potential spirits via their flashlight.
attributes.description: Trevor and Alfredo explore more of the ship and attempt to engage in additional conversation with potential spirits via their flashlight.
attributes.display_title: Deleted Scene: Creepy Hallway & Bonus Flashlight Room

attributes.title: Deleted Scene: Radio Control
attributes.caption: Trevor has a surprise in store for Alfredo, and Christian tells the team about something he noticed on his camera.
attributes.description: Trevor has a surprise in store for Alfredo, and Christian tells the team about something he noticed on his camera.

attributes.title: Deleted Scene: Sick Bay Conversation
attributes.caption: While Trevor shuts himself in the isolation ward in the sick bay, Alfredo and Christian post up outside to attempt to ask more questions to any potential spirits via their flashlight.
attributes.description: While Trevor shuts himself in the isolation ward in the sick bay, Alfredo and Christian post up outside to attempt to ask more questions to any potential spirits via their flashlight.

attributes.title: Deleted Scene: Can Trevor Come In?
attributes.caption: Before Trevor rejoins the rest of the team in the surgery room of the sick bay, Alfredo and Christian ask any potential spirits if Trevor is allowed to join them. They received a response.
attributes.description: Before Trevor rejoins the rest of the team in the surgery room of the sick bay, Alfredo and Christian ask any potential spirits if Trevor is allowed to join them. They received a response.
attributes.display_title: Deleted Scene: Can Trevor Come In?
